item.title: Plantuml
item.description: Usando ícones 1@startuml ../../static/img/plantuml-icon-01.png 2 3skinparam DefaultFontSize 24 4skinparam DefaultTextAlignment center 5 6title <&caret-right> Using icons in PlantUML <&caret-left> 7 8package "Charts <&menu>" as charts { 9 10 file bar [ 11 Bar 12 13 <size:120><&bar-chart></size> 14 ] 15 16 file pie [ 17 Pie 18 19 <size:42><&pie-chart></size> 20 ] 21 22} 23 24@enduml Exemplo de uso de ícone. Ícones disponíveis 1@startuml ../../static/img/plantuml-icon-02.png 2listopeniconic 3@enduml Ícones disponíveis Referências PlantUML Pleasantness: Using The Built-in Icons
